Name: A Slit of Joy
About the game: Synopsis Finn was sad, so he killed himself. But he was greeted by Aoi a mysterious girl who granted him one wish before he gets reincarnated. Finn's wish, he wanted to see if anyone cared at all that he had committed suicide. Even though he knows no one ever cared about him. Info A psychological RPGMaker game, created solely by GameMaker8YT. Follow Aoi and Finn on their journey full of sadness and regret, solve puzzles, make story changing decisions, in a world that is no longer yours. Features Multiple Endings Experience the tragic and physiological story of Finn Filled with dialogue Short duration (45-60 minutes)
